chapter.title: Introduction to Securing Red Hat CloudForms
chapter.para: The Red Hat CloudForms appliance is distributed as a virtual machine image, which provides users with a simple process of installation. The appliance also contains a set of factory default settings that can expose appliances to vulnerabilities if left unset. This guide provides a set procedures to secure your Red Hat CloudForms appliance. This ensures your appliance is properly protected against any unwarranted intrusion.
It is recommended to perform these steps immediately after installing all appliances in your infrastructure.
